label.name: Name
label.date-filter-message: If you don't set a date, today's date will be taken
label.pasword-must-be-6-length: Password must be at least 6 characters.
label.password-must-contain-digit: Password must contain at least 1 digit.
label.password-must-contain-uppercase-letter: Password must contain at least 1 uppercase letter.
label.password-must-contain-lowercase-letter: Password must contain at least 1 lowercase letter.
label.password-must-contain-special-character: Password must contain at least 1 special character.
label.reset-password-instructions: Enter the new password you would like to use.
label.reset-password-succeeded: Your password has been successfully reset. You can now log in.
label.valid-password: Password must me at least 6 characters and include one non-alphanumeric character!
label.forgot-password-instructions: Enter the email adress you used when you joing and we'll send you instructions to reset your password.
label.forgot-password-email-sent: We have send and email to {{email}}. Please follow the enclosed link to reset your password.
label.verify-email-notification: We have send a verification code to your email.
label.verify-email-copy-code: Copy the code from the email sent to
label.verify-email-check-spam: Make sure to check your Spam or Junk box!

errors.MaxFileSizeReached: Couldn't upload. Maximum file size is {{maxSizeInMb}} MB.
errors.CanOnlyUploadPhotos: Image load failed. Unsupported media type or corrupted file.
errors.EmailNotSent: Unexpected error, we couldn't send the email, try again later.
